pull.title: mini miner: enable `Linearize` return package feerates
pull.body:
This PR adds supports for mini miner to return the package fee rates of the linearized transactions

The first step for #30079

It is motivated by https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30079#issuecomment-3191510709

events.message:
mini miner: enable `Linearize` return package feerates

Co-authored-by: willcl-ark <will@256k1.dev>

events.body: This PR only extends the return data with the package fee rate, but it does not use the new data. Is a follow-up PR available (as draft) where the new data is used?

comments.body: nit: Add a comment on the struct?

comments.body: nit: Consider removing 'both': it is prone to going stale with future change and it adds not much information
I think the variable name is descriptive enough hence no need for a comment.
